Elections!
Campaign:
Hello fellow human beings,
Looking for someone dedicated, organized, and experienced?

This is your lucky day!
As a 4-time class president,

2-time editor-in-chief (for a total of 160 pages),

full-time friend,

part-time software engineer,

*sometimes anime watcher*,

and member of the secondary 5 student union,

I have worked on countless large-scale intercollegiate projects, and spent innumerable Saturday evenings typing furiously, while designing colorful patterns on Canva.

My mandate will be to connect our students to the opportunities (research and jobs) they need to grow.

Yet, most importantly, I will be here to listen to any of your inquiries.

Link: https://linktr.ee/xinlei55555
Sincerely yours,
Xin Lei Lin
